SELECT CASE WHEN b.large_code IS NULL THEN '합계' ELSE b.large_code END, CASE WHEN b.large_code IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE MAX(c.code_name) END AS lcode, SUM(plan_qty) AS plan_qty, SUM(qty) AS qty, SUM(weig) AS weig,
CASE WHEN SUM(weig) + SUM(qty) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(weig) / SUM(qty) END AS avg_qty FROM ( SELECT pro_code, san_qty AS plan_qty, 0 AS qty, 0 AS weig FROM openmps.mp_plan_cm_d a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.work_date BETWEEN #strtDate# AND #lastDate# AND a.dele_yn = 'N' AND a.san_qty>0 AND a.plant_code IN (SELECT a.plant_code FROM openmps.tm_platxm a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.grup_plant = #plantCode#) UNION ALL SELECT pro_code, work_qty AS plan_qty, 0 as qty, 0 as weig FROM openmps.mp_plan_pm_m a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.work_date BETWEEN #strtDate# AND #lastDate# AND a.dele_yn = 'N' AND a.plant_code IN (SELECT a.plant_code FROM openmps.tm_platxm a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.grup_plant = #plantCode#) UNION ALL SELECT pro_code, 0, 1 AS qty, a.box_weig AS weig FROM openmps.mp_bar_pro_m a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.pro_date BETWEEN #strtDate# AND #lastDate# AND a.prdt_type IN ('1', '2') AND a.dele_yn = 'N' AND a.plant_code IN (SELECT a.plant_code FROM openmps.tm_platxm a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.grup_plant = #plantCode#) UNION ALL SELECT pro_code, 0, 1 AS qty, b.pro_weig AS weig FROM openmps.mp_auto_total_m a, openmps.mp_item_master_m b WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.work_date BETWEEN #strtDate# AND #lastDate# AND a.dele_yn = 'N' AND a.corp_code = b.corp_code AND a.pro_name = b.pro_name AND a.plant_code IN (SELECT a.plant_code FROM openmps.tm_platxm a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.grup_plant = #plantCode#)) a, openmps.mp_item_master_m b LEFT JOIN tm_codexd c ON b.corp_code = c.corp_code AND b.large_code = c.code_id AND c.group_code = 'MP006'
WHERE a.pro_code = b.pro_code AND b.corp_code = #corpCode# GROUP BY ROLLUP(b.large_code) HAVING GROUPING(b.large_code) = 0 ORDER BY b.large_code

SELECT CASE WHEN b.large_code IS NULL THEN '합계' ELSE b.large_code END, CASE WHEN b.large_code IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE MAX(c.code_name) END AS lcode, CASE WHEN a.pro_code IS NULL THEN CASE WHEN b.large_code IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE '소계' END ELSE a.pro_code END, CASE WHEN a.pro_code IS NULL THEN NULL ELSE MAX(b.pro_name) END AS pro_name, SUM(plan_qty) AS plan_qty, SUM(qty) AS qty, SUM(weig) AS weig,
CASE WHEN SUM(weig) + SUM(qty) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(weig) / SUM(qty) END AS avg_qty FROM ( SELECT pro_code, san_qty AS plan_qty, 0 AS qty, 0 AS weig FROM openmps.mp_plan_cm_d a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.work_date BETWEEN #strtDate# AND #lastDate# AND a.dele_yn = 'N' AND a.san_qty > 0 AND a.plant_code IN (SELECT a.plant_code FROM openmps.tm_platxm a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.grup_plant = #plantCode#) UNION ALL SELECT pro_code, work_qty AS plan_qty, 0 as qty, 0 as weig FROM openmps.mp_plan_pm_m a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.work_date BETWEEN #strtDate# AND #lastDate# AND a.dele_yn = 'N' AND a.plant_code IN (SELECT a.plant_code FROM openmps.tm_platxm a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.grup_plant = #plantCode#) UNION ALL SELECT pro_code, 0, 1 AS qty, a.box_weig AS weig FROM openmps.mp_bar_pro_m a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.pro_date BETWEEN #strtDate# AND #lastDate# AND a.prdt_type IN ('1', '2') AND a.dele_yn = 'N' AND a.plant_code IN (SELECT a.plant_code FROM openmps.tm_platxm a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.grup_plant = #plantCode#) UNION ALL SELECT pro_code, 0, 1 AS qty, b.pro_weig AS weig FROM openmps.mp_auto_total_m a, openmps.mp_item_master_m b WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.work_date BETWEEN #strtDate# AND #lastDate# AND a.dele_yn = 'N' AND a.corp_code = b.corp_code AND a.pro_name = b.pro_name AND a.plant_code IN (SELECT a.plant_code FROM openmps.tm_platxm a WHERE a.corp_code = #corpCode# AND a.grup_plant = #plantCode#)) a, openmps.mp_item_master_m b LEFT JOIN tm_codexd c ON b.corp_code = c.corp_code AND b.large_code = c.code_id AND c.group_code = 'MP006'
WHERE a.pro_code = b.pro_code AND b.corp_code = #corpCode# GROUP BY ROLLUP(b.large_code, a.pro_code) HAVING GROUPING(b.large_code, a.pro_code) = 0 ORDER BY b.large_code, a.pro_name
